Package command

Class ListEventsCommand

Object
command.ListEventsCommand
All Implemented Interfaces:
ICommand
Direct Known Subclasses:
ListEventsOnGivenDateCommand
public class ListEventsCommand
extends Object
implements ICommand
ListEventsCommand allows anyone to get a list of Events available on the system.

  • Constructor Summary

    ListEventsCommand​(boolean userEventsOnly, boolean activeEventsOnly)

  • Constructor Details

    • ListEventsCommand

      public ListEventsCommand​(boolean userEventsOnly, boolean activeEventsOnly)
      Parameters:
      userEventsOnly - if true, the returned events will be filtered depending on the logged-in user: for EntertainmentProviders only the Events they have created, and for Consumers only the Events that match their ConsumerPreferences
      activeEventsOnly - if true, returned Events will be filtered to contain only Events with EventStatus.ACTIVE

  • Method Details

    • execute

      public void execute​(Context context)
      Description copied from interface: ICommand
      This method should not be called directly outside of testing. Normal usage is to create a command object and execute it by passing to Controller.runCommand(ICommand) instead.
      Specified by:
      execute in interface ICommand
      Parameters:
      context - object that provides access to global application state
      Verifies that:
      • if userEventsOnly is set, the current user must be logged in

    • getResult

      public List<Event> getResult()
      Description copied from interface: ICommand
      Get the result from the latest run of the command.
      Specified by:
      getResult in interface ICommand
      Returns:
      List of Events if successful and null otherwise
